about_me_text: A Software Developer  passionate about simple and efficient solutions for challenging problems. With one year of practical experience, my journey includes improving essential technologies such as JavaScript and React, along with the ability to create modern interfaces using TailwindCSS and Bootstrap. Additionally, I bring solid knowledge in GIT version control and practical experience in testing with Jest to ensure code quality.
about_me_text_2: I am eager to apply my learning and actively contribute to challenging projects. In pursuit of my first professional opportunity as a developer, I am committed to continuous growth and learning, contributing to the success of the team and the company. For me, minimalism is the key to staying focused on what truly matters for users. I always pay attention to details and maintain a focus on professional ethics.
about_me_text_3: At high school, I had an intense three years of programming classes, including a Final Project made at the end of the third year. Since then, I followed a different paths. I worked with Excel and PowerBI data manipulation, creating P&L's and improving the ones we already had in the company. But I found myself in love with programming once again.

main: My goal is to always deliver efficient and well-tested solutions, using the best development practices.

projects_paragraph: I've worked on a number of projects, but these are my main ones. From time to time, I still look at them and check if something need to be renewed or recoded.
